sentences.sentence: He has already voted by absentee ballot.
sentences.translation: 他已经通过缺席投票的方式投了票。

sentences.sentence: After Hurricane Florence and Hurricane Michae last fall,USPS worked with state and local election boards to make sure that absentee ballots were available and received on time.
sentences.translation: 在去年秋天的佛罗伦萨飓风和迈克尔飓风之后，美国邮政与州和地方选举委员会合作，确保缺席选票的有效性和及时性。

sentences.sentence: Absentee fathers will be forced to pay child support.
sentences.translation: 不和孩子在一起的父亲会被强制支付子女抚养费。
